Package org.lantern.cookie

Interface Summary
CookieFilter Interface for describing predicates that accept or reject Cookies.
CookieFilter.Factory  
CookieTracker  
SetCookieObserver Interface for receiving notification of downstream Set-Cookie headers.
 

Class Summary
CookieUtils Utilities related to browser-like cookie logic mostly derived from RFC 6265
CookieUtils.RFC6265SetCookieFilter  
InMemoryCookieTracker receives notification of Set-Cookies and stores legal Cookies in memory.
SetCookieObserverHandler A ChannelHander that observes downstream Set-Cookie headers in HttpResponses and passes them to a SetCookieObserver.
StoredCookie A Cookie with some extra details associated with storage and matching.
UpstreamCookieFilterHandler ChannelUpstreamHandler that filters cookies in an HttpRequest using a CookieFilter
